name: Pythagoras Premium
description:
Refresh and improve your maths skills from high school and train your brain and your numeracy skills.

Pythagoras Quiz is a collection of maths puzzles based on famous Pythagorean theorem: C^2 = B^2 + A^2

Premium version is completely Ads free. Focus on challenges!

Don't be scared. It's not that difficult and the game gives lots of satisfaction.

If you're studying Pythagorean theorem at school, play this game and you will get A+ on your exam.

Game gives you "I'm a genius" feel factor. Impress your friends with your new skills!

Train your memory by having to power numbers, square numbers and add and subtract numbers

- Choose the right answer from 3 choices
- It's simple, yet challenging
- Lots of satisfaction after completing questions
- Questions difficulty increases while you play
- You have 60 seconds to answer each question
- If you don't want to stress out, you can switch timer off
- Friendly and easy to use interface
- Track your Best score and try to beat your high score
- Focus and use your multitasking skills by holding numbers in your memory
- It will boost your memory power and stimulate brain sharpness
